mean_cn: adj. 无担保的，不牢固的，未包装好的
mean_en: relating to a loan (= an amount of money that is lent) for which the person who has lent the money has no right to take property from the person who has borrowed it, if the money is not paid back
sentence: Nowadays many companies provide unsecured loans whereby your personal property is not linked.
sentence_trans: 现在许多机构都提供无需个人财产抵押的无担保贷款。
word_etyma: un无，不 + se分开 + cur关心 + ed形容词后缀→unsecured无担保的，不牢固的，未包装好的
